name: Extrajudicial Advocacy
text: Bianca Rocha Advocacia is a complete law firm, always looking for a quick solution to issues, saving the client's time and increasing satisfaction with the resolution.

name: Family And Succession Law
text: Personalized approach to each case, experience in judicial and extrajudicial divorces, inventories, custody proceedings, etc.

name: Consultancies
text: Specialized consultancy in processes involving Real Estate Law, with preparation and review of contracts, analysis of purchase and sale risk, adverse possession, possessory actions, etc.
